<Component id="radarChart2" name="<%- db_double_base_layer_new_radarChart2_name %>" x="200" y="150" width="400" height="300" visible="false" moveable="true" removeable="true" resizeable="true" editable="true" icon="$IAICON/48x48/pie-chart.png" classes="ia-panel ia-panel-header">
Displays multivariate data in the form of a two-dimensional chart of three or more indicators represented on axes starting from the same point. Use in conjunction with the 'Selected Features Legend'.
